articles.content: Britains chances of an improbable run on home soil at the Billie Jean King Cup Finals took a significant blow on Tuesday night as they were outmatched by a strong Kazakhstan team, falling 2-1 in thei… [+3296 chars]

articles.title: Uefa hits out with damning critique of European Super League’s status - The Guardian
articles.description: Uefa met A22, the business formed to deliver the Super League and Uefa said: ‘ESL has as many supporters as UK PMs in the last two months’

articles.title: Richard Keys says Trent should have been sent off for what he did against Spurs - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Former Sky Sports pundit Richard Keys believes Liverpool right-back Trent Alexander-Arnold should have been sent off in the Reds' win over Tottenham Hotspur
articles.content:
Richard Keys believes Trent Alexander-Arnold should have been sent off during Liverpool's win over Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday evening in North London.
